title: Competition: Win VIP entry to the Ford RideLondon-Essex 2023
content:
Cyclist
Competition: Win VIP entry to the Ford RideLondon-Essex 2023

It’s almost that time. Next month the streets of London and Essex will be taken over by Ford RideLondon, the world’s greatest festival of cycling and Britain’s biggest sportive.

To celebrate Ford’s ‘Park the Car’ initiative to promote active travel over driving short distances, as well as the release of the new Ford Explorer electric car, Ford RideLondon has given us 20, yes twenty, free VIP tickets to this year’s Ford RideLondon-Essex sportive on Sunday 28th May.

What’s included in the VIP tickets?

  • Pre-ride VIP breakfast
  • Your choice of start time and position
  • Mechanical support
  • VIP baggage handling
  • A private cafe stop en route with a pre-order menu
  • Exclusive finish recovery area
  • Exclusive finish catering
  • Exclusive guest meet and greet area

All you have to do to win is answer one simple question in response to our Facebook or Twitter posts:

In what year did the Tour de France ride through Essex?

  • 2013
  • 2014
  • 2015

20 winners will be selected at random on 27th April 2023, terms and conditions are below, good luck.

Terms & Conditions

The Competition will be operated by The Metropolis Group. There are twenty prize places available in total.

By participating in the competition, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

  • This competition is open to any person resident in the UK who is 18 years of age or older at the time of entry.

  •  Employees of Metropolis Group or their affiliates, subsidiaries, advertising or promotion agencies are not eligible, nor are members of these employees’ families (defined as parents, children, siblings, spouse and life partners).

  • There are twenty prizes in total, each prize will be awarded to a different entrant in the form of a VIP entry to the Ford RideLondon – Essex 100.

  • To enter the competition you must submit your answer via our social channels. The competition is will close at 12.00 on 27th April 2023. You acknowledge that it will not be treated in confidence. Metropolis Group reserves the right to reshare your post on its own social channels, customer communications outlets, and internal usage.

  • Each prize will only be available to the winner in person. Under no circumstances can the place be awarded to another individual, and the place must be used by the prize winner. No cash or other prize alternatives are available.

  • Once the places have been awarded to the winners, Metropolis Group will not take any further responsibility for the use of the place, and it is the responsibility of the winner to ensure they complete any further information required in response to the automated Ford RideLondon communications.

  • Winners will be selected at random by a third party adjudicator and their decision is final and binding.

Metropolis Group reserves the right to require the winners to participate in publicity events in relation to this competition for the Metropolis Group. In particular, Metropolis Group may publish the winner(s) name, county and photographs on the Cyclist Facebook page (www.facebook.com/forduk), Instagram (https://www.instagram.com/forduk), in future editions of Ford’s eCRM newsletter, Ford News Magazine, and photographs and footage of the winner and guest during their trip on www.ford.co.uk. By participating in the competition, you agree to participate in these publicity events and activities.

  • Metropolis Group reserves the right to withdraw the competition due to circumstances outside its control.

  • The names and the home town of the prize winners will be available within 3 months of the competition date by sending a SAE to: Metropolis Group, 10th Floor, Southern House, Wellesley Grove, Croydon, CR0 1XG.

  • Promoter: Metropolis Group, 10th Floor, Southern House, Wellesley Grove, Croydon, CR0 1XG. Do not send entries to this address.

Data Protection

By entering the competition and posting content, you will provide personal information including your name, and contact details Instagram or Facebook profile(s) and post(s). This information will be publicly displayed. Metropolis Group may share this information on Metropolis Group’s social channels, customer communications outlets and internally. If you are selected as a competition winner, Metropolis Group will use this information to contact you and may also publish images and footage of you across Metropolis Group Channels. Metropolis Group have a legitimate interest to use the information to run the competition and to promote the Metropolis Group business.  For more information, including international data transfers and how to exercise your rights, please see Metropolis Group’s Privacy Policy https://www.metropolis.co.uk/consents/privacy/
